author: Mickey Britton
description: Mickey Britton, the creator of this drink describes it as "the missing link between three classic cocktails: Corpse Reviver No.2, a Satan's Whiskers and the infamous Sidecar."
name: The Corpse's Whiskers
recipeIngredient: 10 ml Lillet Blanc (or other aromatized wine)
7.5 ml Demerara/Muscovado/brown sugar syrup (2 sugar:1 water)

recipeInstructions.text: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass
